projects.title: Smart Inventory System
projects.description: A web platform for real-time tracking and management of warehouse inventory. This is an inovative platform to increase the popularity of web courses among children

projects.title: E-Learning Portal
projects.description: A responsive educational platform for students and instructors with course management features.

projects.description: A cross-platform mobile app for scheduling medical appointments and consultations.

projects.title: Team Collaboration Tool
projects.description: An internal communication and task management tool for agile teams.

projects.title: Restaurant Ordering System
projects.description: A digital ordering and delivery management solution for restaurants.

tasks.title: Setup Angular Project Structure
